args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Senate Democrats plan 30-hour protest of Vought’s nomination for OMB Senate Democrats plan to protest the confirmation vote of Russell Vought to lead the Office of Management and Budget by holding the Senate floor for the full 30 hours of debate that are allowed before a final vote Thursday. Democrats will speak overnight about what they see as the dangers of Vought’s vision for reducing federal spending through freezing and reviewing funds. Vought, who has warned that the government is “woke and weaponized” and has said federal workers should be viewed as villains, is emerging as a new opponent for Democrats given President Donald Trump’s aggressive moves to overhaul and diminish some federal agencies. He is expected to be confirmed Thursday on a party-line vote.
